group_1.textRight: Hmm?@You’re being really fussy with your cleaning.

group_1.textLeft: Actually, I’ll be getting interviewed for a major@news website today.

group_1.textRight: Oohh!@As expected of a best-selling author!
Oh, it might be them.
I greatly appreciate your willingness to accept@such a sudden request.

group_1.textLeft: Oh no, it’s my honor to have you.
Here’s your tea.

group_1.textRight: Oh, is this a friend of yours?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, she’s a friend…and roommate.

group_1.textRight: Roommate…
Then how about I interview her as well?

group_1.textLeft: Huh?
If that's the case, Kaoru should be in this too.
Hm?

group_1.textRight: Now, for the next…question…
What is your preferred way to relax when@facing creative blocks?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, yes…@I don’t encounter them very often, but
if I calm myself down and give in to the@passage of time, I’ll naturally feel…
Nope, she’s lying, Ms. Reporter!
Your nose’s gonna grow!
She’ll actually go to department stores and@spend until all her stress is gone!
And then she cooks with this ridiculous look@on her face!
She looks like a haunted old hag when she@holds a knife!
H-hey! Cut it out!

group_1.textRight: On the topic of your cooking!@I’d like to see it first hand.
Please, if you don’t mind!

group_1.textLeft: Ms. Reporter?

group_1.textRight: Oooh, so this is the food you prepare when@you have writer’s block…
Hot dogs, pasta salad…@Even the waffles are homemade.

group_1.textLeft: Y-yes…

group_1.textRight: So this is your menu of choice for getting the@creativity flowing in your head.

group_1.textLeft: Well, sort of, yes.

group_1.textRight: The food really gets her some wie-ning ideas!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, her hands start to noodle around the@keyboard nonstop.
Then she’s wa-full of inspiration.

group_1.textRight: Oh, a pun…what a cute play on words!

group_1.textLeft: You can just call them puns!@There’s no need to humor them!

group_1.textRight: But still…
I could never imagine that such a prodigy author@and athlete would be living together.
Could I presume you to have some special@talent as well…?

group_1.textLeft: Well…I guess…not really, I think?

group_1.textRight: Oh, is that so…

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle*...
Nope, she’s lying,@Ms. Reporter.
Michiru is probably the greatest of us three.
Some things happened, and the two of us were@at our breaking point…
But Michiru showed us that,@even in the deepest
pits of despair, hope still exists.
Michiru is the reason I’m here right now.
She’s the cornerstone of our hearts…our hero.
You guys…@Sheesh, you’re making me blush.

group_1.textRight: You three make an amazing team.
[chara:800600:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]I look forward to your future endeavors!

group_1.textLeft: On that note…is this alright for an interview?
(It’s got jokes all over the place,@I wonder if they’ll edit those out.)

group_1.narration: “’I look forward to your future endeavors,’@life really is full of ironies.”
“The end of this diary is filled with despair…”
“It makes me think of what will become of the@new future she’ll bring about…”
